"Leader, can you help us with our missio:
"Our mission is to raise awareness of Weaponoids...
This time, five of us were assigned to carry it out."
"Seraphy told us to \"Show them the power of Weaponoids\". Perhaps our predecessors were not up to that task."
"...Is that what you think? Anyway, Leader, we should all help each other on this mission!"
"That's as good a way of putting it as any. Leader, if you have no objections to fighting with us, please take this Partner Card."
